annonstext:
We’re looking to add an experienced UX designer to work alongside our designers, sales and dev teams. Besides having a passion for producing amazing UX, we think you’ll be versed in a wide variety of skills from psychology to design and tech to realise our product roadmaps and make sure each feature and product addition will be loved.

Tasks and responsibilities
- Translate business and user needs and technology constraints into product solutions that are meaningful, easy to use, and engaging (Great UX)
- Combine UX thinking with design execution to produce usable and intuitive user interfaces together with our product development team (HTML + CSS)
- Write compelling and user-friendly product copy and ensure it’s in line with both brand and business goals

Skills and requirements
- Proven work experience as a UX designer or similar role
- Confident in writing clear and concise UX copy (English)
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Creative and analytical mindset
- Superb attention to detail
- Basic HTML + CSS knowledge

We offer
- Full time permanent position
- Great opportunity to work in an international environment and as a part of a committed team of professionals
- Remote work possibilities and flextime
- Modern tools, ergonomic working environment, competitive salary, and great employee benefits

About Lanefinder
At Lanefinder, we’re building the fastest growing labor marketplace for truck drivers and trucking companies in the US, going head to head with some of the largest job sites in the world. The US trucking industry is the second largest industry in America employing 1 out of every 15 Americans and at the core of the industry you’ll find the 3.5million truck drivers who we build amazing job search experiences for through Lanefinder.com.

We’re a highly technical and growth driven team consisting of  22 team members in Malmö (Lilla Torg).
